solution_line_template: Bellas has {total_percentage}% / {bella_percentage_of_monica}% = {ratio_monica_to_bella} times less earrings than Monica.
This means that Monica has {bella_earrings} * {ratio_monica_to_bella} = <<{bella_earrings}*{ratio_monica_to_bella}={monica_earrings}>>{monica_earrings} earrings.
Rachel has {rachel_divisor} times fewer earrings than Monica, which means {monica_earrings} / {rachel_divisor} = <<{monica_earrings}/{rachel_divisor}={rachel_earrings}>>{rachel_earrings} earrings.
So all three friends, have a total of {bella_earrings} + {monica_earrings} + {rachel_earrings} = <<{bella_earrings}+{monica_earrings}+{rachel_earrings}={total_earrings}>>{total_earrings} earrings.
